Posts.Content: Hi Pink Ladies, I had  a lumpectomy, but so many of the women I've met on line have had breast reconstruction and have had a thousand questions, so I wrote a 3-part series on this. Short, easy read but I tried to answer the questions. At the bottom of each article are links to more.  Am posting for whoever may have questions and hope it helps.http://www.1uponcancer.com/breast/ " target="_blank" rel="nofollow">http://www.1uponcancer.com/breast/ Best to you all, Rachel http://www.1uponcancer.com/breast/ " target="_blank" rel="nofollow">http://www.1uponcancer.com/breast/
Posts.Title: Breast Reconstrution
